profile.name: François Chollet
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Remote | Expert in Rust Systems Programming & Python Development
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for building scalable systems. Proficient in Rust and Python, with experience in database sharding and open-source development.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend the following companies as potential employers for François Chollet

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend the following companies as potential employers for François Chollet
description: Designed and implemented a high-performance Rust-based system for data processing and analysis.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy scalable software solutions.
Mentored junior engineers on best practices for code quality, testing, and deployment.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple Python-based projects for various clients, including data analysis and machine learning applications.
Created and maintained open-source repositories on GitHub, contributing to the Rust community.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to multiple Rust-based open-source projects, including bug fixes and feature enhancements.
Participated in community discussions and provided guidance on best practices for code quality and testing.
